string-array.name: recipe_data_hamburger
string-array.item: Cook patties on a stovetop until they appear completely brown on the outside.\n Place each patty within a bun. Add on top of it, as desired, the lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese.

string-array.name: recipe_data_lasagna
string-array.item: Cook noodles by boiling them in water for ten minutes. Layer noodles, tomato sauce, and cheese in a tray. Place in the oven at 350°F for 30 mins.

string-array.name: recipe_data_salad
string-array.item: Cut the tomatoes, cucumbers, and onions into thin slices. Add all the ingredients into a large bowl and mix. Drizzle dressing on top.

string-array.name: recipe_data_spaghetti
string-array.item: Place spaghetti noodles into boiling water. Wait ten minutes, then pour noodles into colander. Add sauce and meatballs on top.
